PHRASE.LANG: I saved the city, saved the girl, but couldn’t save myself... Superheroes and street warriors will know how this feels. [#Legal]
J'ai sauvé la ville, j'ai sauvé la fille, mais je n'ai rien pu faire pour moi... Les super-héros et les bagarreurs savent de quoi je parle. [#Legal]
„Ich habe die Stadt gerettet, habe das Mädchen gerettet, aber konnte mir nicht selbst helfen..." Superhelden und Straßenkämpfer wissen, wie sich das anfühlt. [#Legal]
"I saved the city, saved the girl, but couldn’t save myself..." supereroi e guerrieri urbani sapranno che significa. [#Legal]
Salvé la ciudad, a la chica, pero no pude salvarme a mí mismo... Los superhéroes y los luchadores callejeros sabrán qué significa. [#Legal]
I saved the city, saved the girl, but couldn’t save myself... Superheroes and street warriors will know how this feels. [#Legal]
I saved the city, saved the girl, but couldn’t save myself... Superheroes and street warriors will know how this feels. [#Legal]
I saved the city, saved the girl, but couldn’t save myself... Superheroes and street warriors will know how this feels. [#Legal]
